resources.string:
By downloading, installing, or using the RemoteTracker software, accessing or using the RemoteTracker service (together, the "Products" or "Services"), or accessing or using any of the content available within the Products, you agree to be bound by the following:


(1) Safely use: NEVER USE THE INFORMATION OBTAINED FROM REMOTETRACKER AND TRY TO GET BACK YOUR DEVICE. SEND INFORMATION OBTAINED TO LOCAL POLICE, WHICH ARE TRAINED FOR THIS SERVICE. Remember that it is not worth risking your life because of a device that can be bought again. The developer or any partner has no responsibility of bad use of this software;
 (2) the terms found on our License page;
 (3) the additional terms and conditions set forth below:


Before you continue, you should read each of these two documents, as together they form a binding agreement between you and JVSoftware regarding your use of the Products. Collectively, the License Terms and the Additional Terms are referred to as the "Terms".

As a condition of downloading, accessing, or using the Products, you also agree to the terms of the JVSoftware Privacy Policy.
 1. Use of the Products. JVSoftware grants you a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access the RemoteTracker service and to access the Content (as defined below) within the Products and according to the Terms.
 2. Restrictions on Use. JVSoftware only authorize the use of RemoteTracker to track your own device if you lose it or if you was stolen. This information can only be used to retrieve your lost device. You cannot use this information to any other purpose. Any other use of this software is responsibility of the user and must be in accordance with the law.
 3. Appropriate Conduct; Compliance with Law. You agree that you are responsible for your own conduct and content while using the Products, and for any consequences thereof. You agree to use the Products only for purposes that are legal, proper and in accordance with the Terms and any applicable policies or guidelines JVSoftware may make available.
 4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES AND LIMITATIONS ON LIABILITY. JVSOFTWARE AND ITS LICENSORS MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES REGARDING THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF ANY CONTENT OR THE PRODUCTS. 
 5. JVSOFTWARE AND ITS LICENSORS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES IN CONNECTION WITH THE CONTENT AND THE PRODUCTS, AND WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGE OR LOSS RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF THE CONTENT OR THE PRODUCTS.
 6. Support: RemoteTracker is a software without any warranty. You must be sure you want to use this software without guarantee of support from developers. Your questions can be sent to http://remotetracker.sourceforge.net/support.html but that does not mean you get an answer.
 7. Source code: RemoteTracker is not an open source project. You can not get the source code of the project, can not get the sources from reverse engineering or any other techniques.
In debug mode RemoteTracker will create a file named remotetracker.txt in memory card with useful informations for developer.
Check this if you want use the WIPEDATA command to remotelly restore to factory default, format memory card and not allow to uninstall RemoteTracker.
Your name will be send to your emergency contacts.
Please type a secret question to retrieve your password if you forget it.
Please type an answer for your secret question.
Time, in seconds, to try get coordinates using GPS. When this time is over, the location will be get using Google Location Service.
This address will be used when RT receive an e-mail command without specified return address.
Please enter the FTP server address (ftp.foobar.com)
This command is not available in Android devices.
GPS and network unavailable. Can\'t get current position.
The message can\'t be empty. Please use the extra parameter: rt#msg,your message##password.
Feel free to send comments, criticisms and suggestions for future releases.
No returning e-mail address was specified.
The E-Mail configurations are invalid or incomplete. RT cannot send e-mail answers.
An error occurred trying send E-Mail. Please take a look in configurations.
You must define at least one known SIM Card.
RemoteTracker alert: the SIM Card of {0} was changed.
This phone does not have a default return e-mail address to receive messages.
This phone does not have a FTP server configured to receive files.
Enter here the numbers of phones and emails of your friends that will be triggered in cases of exchange of the SIM Card and other emergencies.
This command is only available in RemoteTrackerPro.
There is a captured picture while SEND button was pressed!
RemoteTracker was configured to start capture pictures.
RemoteTracker was configured to stop capture pictures.
RemoteTracker was configured to take a photo on call.
RemoteTracker was configured to stop taking photo on call.
There is no front camera on this device.
This installation does not have a secret question.
This installation does not have an answer for the secret question.
The file {0} was sent to you.
The file {0} could not be sent to you.
The application was not defined. Please use the extra parameter to define the application to run.
This device was locked by the owner.
Impossible to show an empty message.
Impossible to send an empty message.
You must define the phone number.
Active RemoteTracker to be a Device Admin to keep your device safe.

This is a software for your personal security. It will help you find your device if you lose it. This program works intercepting SMS and responding to commands. Please see the HELP option to see how it works.
"You need to confirm your command. Please send another SMS:
This device is not a Device Admin. You have to check this option in Config menu.
The user cannot restore to factory default.
The key is wrong. Try again.
Restoring your device to factory default and formatting SD card.
Are you sure? Remove RemoteTracker from Device Admin make anybody able to uninstall this application and let your device unsafe.
This contact does not have any phone number
This contact does not have any e-mail address
, send a SMS with the syntax: RT#(command)#(phone or e-mail)#(password).
Get current location from GPS or Network and send a SMS back.
Same as GP, but send an E-Mail back.
Same as GP, but send a file to FTP Server.
Get IMEI, IMSI and ICCID and send a SMS back.
Same as GI, but send an E-Mail back.
Same as GI, but send a file to FTP Server.
Mount this command list and send a SMS back. If you use the extra parameter with some command, only this command will be detailed to you.
Same as HELP, but send an E-Mail back.
Same as HELP, but send a file to FTP Server.
Just make a call back to the sender or to a phone number sent as parameter.
Useful if you forget your password. This command will send to you your Secret Question.
Useful if you forget your password. This command will compare an answer to the answer of your secret question. If OK your password will be sent to you.
current CellId, LAC, MNC and MCC by SMS.
Same as CELLID, but send the result by e-mail.
Same as CELLID, but send the result to FTP Server.
Get your phone book and send to you by SMS.
Same as PB, but send the result by e-mail.
Same as PB, but send the result to FTP Server.
Get a list of all applications installed and send to you by SMS
Same as LISTAPP, but send an E-Mail back
Same as LISTAPP, but send a file to your FTP server
Just start an application. You must type the application name in extra parameter: RT#RUNAPP,(app name)##(password)
Show a message to user with your custom message and lock your device.
Show a message in your device.
Send a SMS to any mobile phone.
Makes RemoteTracker (PRO version only) start monitoring the device\'s cameras and send any picture taken them to default e-mail address.
Makes RemoteTracker (PRO version only) stop monitoring the cameras.
Same as PICSON but sends an e-mail back.
Same as PICSOFF but sends an e-mail back.
Same as PICSON, but sends the response to the FTP server.
Same as PICSOFF, but sends the response to the FTP server.
Makes RemoteTracker (PRO version only) start monitoring the SEND button. Once pressed take a picture with the front camera and sends it to default e-mail address.
Makes RemoteTracker (PRO version only) stop monitoring the SEND button.
Same as PCALLSON but sends an e-mail back.
Same as PCALLSOFF but sends an e-mail back.
Same as PCALLSON, but sends the response to the FTP server.
Same as PCALLSOFF, but sends the response to the FTP server.
Restore device to factory defaults and format the memory card (PRO version only).
Allow access to a locked application for a minute.
Block access to a locked application for a minute.
Get an APK from internet and install it.
Delete a file from internal memory
Move an apk from system/app to system/priv-app (only on kitkat)
Start a service to send the device\'s location from time to time (60 minutes by default)
Stop the service whe send the device\'s location from time to time
Get current location and send e-mail
Get current location and send to FTP
Get IMEI, IMSI and ICCID and send e-mail
Get IMEI, IMSI and ICCID and send to FTP
Get command list and send e-mail
Get command list and send to FTP
Make a call back to you
Get CellId, LAC, MNC and MCC
Get CellId, LAC, MNC and MCC and send e-mail
Get CellId, LAC, MNC and MCC and send to FTP
Get Phone Book and send e-mail
Get Phone Book and send to FTP
Get list of applications and send e-mail
Get list of applications and send to FTP
Send a SMS to any mobile phone
Start monitoring the device\'s cameras and send e-mail
Stop monitoring the cameras and send e-mail
Start monitoring the device\'s cameras and send to FTP
Stop monitoring the cameras and send to FTP
Start monitoring the SEND button and send e-mail
Stop monitoring the SEND button and send e-mail
Start monitoring the SEND button and send to FTP
Stop monitoring the SEND button and send to FTP
Allow access to a locked app
Block access to a locked app
The selected command requires a FTP Server, not a phone number.
Please select a command to send.
Command to help, or leave blank:
This command needs an extra parameter.
Type or select a mobile number.
The file name was not defined.
The file does not exist in /system/app or device is not rooted.
Could not delete the file (not rooted?).
The file was moved to /system/priv-app folder.
The Android version is previous than Kitkat.
The log was sent to your FTP server
The log could not be found
There was an error while sending log to your FTP server
If you got this message your device is not ROOTED
The tracker command was successfully started.
The tracker command was successfully stopped
You need to give all permissions.
You need to define your email address in configurations. Do you want to do it now?
Command not available in lite version.
